statusLine.command: input=$(cat); pwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); home=$HOME; dir="${pwd/#$home/~}"; git_status=''; if git rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'detached'); status=$(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null); if [ -z "$status" ]; then git_status="${branch} âœ“"; else staged=$(echo "$status" | grep -c '^[MADRC]'); unstaged=$(echo "$status" | grep -c '^.[MD]'); untracked=$(echo "$status" | grep -c '^??'); symbols=''; [ $staged -gt 0 ] && symbols="${symbols} +${staged}"; [ $unstaged -gt 0 ] && symbols="${symbols} !${unstaged}"; [ $untracked -gt 0 ] && symbols="${symbols} ?${untracked}"; git_status="${branch}${symbols}"; fi; fi; printf '%s %s | %s' "$dir" "$git_status" "$model"
